Package netaddr :: Package ip :: Module glob :: Class IPGlob
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class IPGlob

object --+        
         |        
    BaseIP --+    
             |    
       IPRange --+
                 |
                IPGlob

Represents an IP address range using a glob-style syntax (x.x.x-y.*).
